name: Commodore Perry
ability: Slightly reduces Max HP; sharply increases skill DMG.

additional_data.description: Captain of the famous black-painted American naval vessels that were the first to visit Japan's shores. A dyed-in-the-wool Japanophile, he's been making the journey even more regularly since becoming A spirit. The locals used to call him a demon, a title he's taken to with strange enthusiasm--he rarely even leaves home without his comedy horn headband these days.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Obtained after clearing Chapter 3.
◦ Available in Jewel Summon after clearing Chapter 3.

skill: "Enemy firepower appraised! All hands on deck!"
summon: "You have need of my wisdom? What's in it for me?"
limit_break: "If I grow stronger, my negotiations might proceed more favorably..."
